schoolDetails: Industrial Engineering is a broad engineering discipline focusing on improving systems and processes by statistical analysis, simulation, design, and quality control. Some of my favorite and more relevant courses were: Introduction to C++, Informatics and System Simulation, and Advanced Data Analytics
amexDetails: I joined Amex in 2019 immediately following graduation! I am on a full stack development team that helps provide digital solutions to American Express Merchants in many markets and countries. Our tech stack includes React, Java Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL.
